ygData.subject: Da Snake Heads Out
ygData.msgSnippet: Serpentor: Serpentor looked around the bridge.  Where the slag is Zardus! Computer: Zardus is currently engaging enemy units What!  And no one told me there

Subject: Da Snake Heads Out
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Serpentor:



Serpentor looked around the bridge.  "Where the slag is Zardus!"

Computer: Zardus is currently engaging enemy units

"What!  And no one told me there was a battle!?  I'm insulted!"

Computer: Zardus gave no orders to tell unit Serpentor of this event

"UNIT Serpentor?  So, he thinks I'm worthless, does he?  I'll show that 
slimey idiot!" he yelled, transforming to his cobra mode and slithering off.
